title: Cant reconnect

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: How am I supposed to reconnect if my client crashes? rito plz{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
This screen shows if you have the game running in the background. If the game completely crashed, it should have ended its own process and you should see a *reconnect* icon where you currently see *game is still in progress*. Essentially, you should have been able to *Alt+Tab* back into the game to either play (if it works) or close to process out completely. 

Let me know if you experience this again.
